alert.note: Alert for Ruby Mountains and East Humboldt Range; South Central Elko County; Southwest Elko County (Nevada) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued August 11 at 2:11PM PDT by NWS Elko
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of southern Elko County through 245 PM PDT... At 210 PM PDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm near Lee, moving north at 15 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph and half inch hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Heavy rainfall along with gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Lamoille Canyon. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.50 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Persons in campgrounds should consider seeking sturdy shelter until this storm passes.

area.areaDesc: Ruby Mountains and East Humboldt Range; South Central Elko County; Southwest Elko County
